Package net.sourceforge.segment.srx

Interface Summary
SrxParser Represents SRX parser that can parse SRX document from reader.
SrxTransformer Represents SRX document transformer between old versions and newest supported version.
 

Class Summary
LanguageMap Represents mapping between language code pattern and language rule.
LanguageRule Represents rule for segmenting text in some language.
Rule Represents break or exception rule.
RuleManager Represents segmentation rules manager.
RuleMatcher Represents matcher finding subsequent occurrences of one rule.
SrxDocument Represents SRX document.
SrxDocumentCache Represents SRX document cache.
SrxTextIterator Represents text iterator splitting text according to rules in SRX file.
TextManager Represents text manager.
